title: How long does riot respond to a ticket
body: I ve submitted a ticket almost a week ago and the status is just on hold the entire time, when does riot usually respond.

replies.body:
Usually tickets will get a response within 48 hours. You may have gotten an automated email saying something like "due to high volume of tickets your request may take longer than usual" in which case it might take some time more than that. Depends on your definition of almost but a week is certainly pushing it.

Have you bumped (replied to before receiving a response) your ticket at all? Bumping your ticket will drop you back to the bottom of the queue so that's a possible explanation.
